TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParallelLoopState extends System.Object

summary.span: 可使并行循环迭代与其他迭代交互。

span.span: Enables iterations of parallel loops to interact with other iterations.

summary.span: 此类的实例由 类提供给每个循环；不能在您的用户代码中创建实例。

span.span: An instance of this class is provided by the class to each loop; you can not create instances in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，不能实例化此类的实例。Note that you cannot instantiate an instance of this class. 自动生成由编译器作为自变量对的调用中或方法。It is automatically generated by the compiler as an argument in a call to the or method. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. 构造，例如`for`和`foreach`（在 C# 中) 和`For`和`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中) 中执行按顺序从最低到最高或从一组中的第一个对象到最后一个。Constructs such as `for` and `foreach` (in C#) and `For` and `For Each` (in Visual Basic) execute sequentially from the lowest index to the highest or from the first object in a set to the last. 与此相反，和方法不这样做。In contrast, the and methods do not. 因为并行运行单独的循环迭代，他们可以开始和结束按任何顺序。Because individual iterations of the loop run in parallel, they can begin and end in any order. 类允许并行循环之间的交互的单个迭代。The class allows individual iterations of parallel loops to interact with one another. 类允许你：The class allows you to: - 退出当前迭代并阻止任何其他迭代通过调用启动方法。Exit the current iteration and prevent any additional iterations from starting by calling the method. 这不会影响已开始执行的迭代。This does not affect iterations that have already begun execution. - 阻止索引大于当前索引的任何迭代通过调用执行方法。Prevent any iterations with an index greater than the current index from executing by calling the method. 这不会影响已开始执行的迭代。This does not affect iterations that have already begun execution. - 确定是否异常发生在任何循环迭代中通过检索的值的属性。Determine whether an exception has occurred in any loop iteration by retrieving the value of the property. - 确定循环的任何迭代是否已调用方法检索的值的属性。Determine whether any iteration of the loop has called the method by retrieving the value of the property. 你可以使用此属性返回到调用之前启动的循环迭代从方法但仍在执行。You can use this property to return from iterations of the loop that started before the call to the method but are still executing. - 确定循环的任何迭代是否已调用或方法或通过检索的值的引发了异常属性。Determine whether any iteration of the loop has called the or method or has thrown an exception by retrieving the value of the property. - 从其索引大于的迭代中调用中断所在通过检索的值的索引的长时间运行迭代退出属性。Exit from a long-running iteration whose index is greater than the index of an iteration in which Break was called by retrieving the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 100 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例所示，其索引大于任何迭代输出在调用后的属性值 start方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 因为的循环迭代仍可能会执行时方法被调用时，每个迭代调用属性检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果属性值是`true`，迭代检查的值属性，如果它大于当前迭代索引值，将立即返回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

threadsafe.span: A实例旨在只在循环到提供实例的正文中使用。

span.span: A instance is meant to be used only within the body of the loop to which an instance was provided.

threadsafe.span: 不安全地使用提供实例关联的循环后结束，也不是安全显式将其提交给其他线程并具有在任何时候访问这些线程。

span.span: It is not safe to use a provided instance after the associated loop ends, nor is it safe to explicitly hand it off to other threads and have those threads access it at any time.

threadsafe.span: 不同实例将提供给一个循环中涉及的每个线程。

span.span: A different instance will be provided to each thread involved in a loop.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Break() cil managed

summary.span: 告知 循环应在系统方便的时候尽早停止执行当前迭代之外的迭代。

span.span: Communicates that the loop should cease execution of iterations beyond the current iteration at the system's earliest convenience.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应运行当前迭代之后没有迭代次数。 indicates that no iterations after the current iteration should be run. 它有效地取消循环的任何其他迭代。It effectively cancels any additional iterations of the loop. 但是，它不会停止任何迭代已开始执行。However, it does not stop any iterations that have already begun execution. 例如，如果从循环从 0 到 1000，所有迭代小于 100 应仍继续运行，但到 1000，尚未启动不从 101 起通过迭代执行并行循环的第 100 迭代调用。For example, if is called from the 100th iteration of a parallel loop iterating from 0 to 1,000, all iterations less than 100 should still be run, but the iterations from 101 through to 1000 that have not yet started are not executed. 对于可能已执行的长时间运行迭代设置属性设置为当前迭代索引的当前索引是否的当前值小于。For long-running iterations that may already be executing, sets the property to the current iteration's index if the current index is less than the current value of . 若要停止其索引大于从竞争执行的最低中断迭代的迭代，应执行以下操作：To stop iterations whose index is greater than the lowest break iteration from competing execution, you should do the following: 1. 检查是否属性是`true`。Check whether the property is `true`. 2. 退出迭代中，如果其索引大于属性值。Exit from the iteration if its index is greater than the property value. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. 通常会使用在其中进行的排序是数据源中存在的基于搜索的算法。 is typically employed in search-based algorithms where an ordering is present in the data source. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 100 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例所示，其索引大于任何迭代输出在调用后的属性值 start方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 因为的循环迭代仍可能会执行时方法被调用时，每个迭代调用属性检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果属性值是`true`，迭代检查的值属性，如果它大于当前迭代索引值，将立即返回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

span.span: The method was previously called.

exception.span: 和 不能被相同循环的迭代组合使用。

span.span: and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsExceptional As Boolean
public: property bool IsExceptional { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取循环的任何迭代是否已引发相应迭代未处理的异常。

span.span: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has thrown an exception that went unhandled by that iteration.

value.span: 如果引发了未经处理的异常，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an unhandled exception was thrown; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsStopped As Boolean
public: property bool IsStopped { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取循环的任何迭代是否已调用 方法。

span.span: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has called the method.

value.span: 如果任何迭代通过调用 方法已停止循环，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if any iteration has stopped the loop by calling the method; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于长时间运行的循环迭代，你可以检索的值属性来确定是否循环的任何迭代的开始到调用之前执行仍在执行方法。For long-running iterations of the loop, you can retrieve the value of the property to determine whether any iterations of the loop that began execution before the call to the method are still executing. 然后可以使用的值属性来确定它们是否应立即返回或正常执行。You can then use the value of the property to determine whether they should return immediately or execute normally. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 10,000 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 10,000 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 因为的循环迭代仍可能会执行时调用方法时，lambda 表达式调用方法来检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, the lambda expression calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果它返回`true`，迭代立即返回。If it returns `true`, the iteration returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/stop1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/stop1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LowestBreakIteration As Nullable(Of Long)
public: property Nullable<long> LowestBreakIteration { Nullable<long> get(); };

summary.span: 获取从中调用 的最低循环迭代。

span.span: Gets the lowest iteration of the loop from which was called.

value.span: 从中调用 的最低迭代。

span.span: The lowest iteration from which was called.

value.span: 如果是 循环，该值会基于内部生成的索引。

span.span: In the case of a loop, the value is based on an internally-generated index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的并行循环调用多个迭代方法。It is possible for multiple iterations of a parallel loop to call the method. 如果是的话，此值是调用一次迭代的最小索引。If they do, this value is the smallest index of an iteration that called . 如果任何迭代循环不调用，此属性返回`null`。If no iteration of the loop called , this property returns `null`. 请注意，属性值是通过调用受影响方法。Note that the property value is unaffected by calls to the method. 在中后调用的迭代的所有迭代的长时间运行迭代方法不需要运行，属性用于终止开始到调用之前执行的迭代方法。In long-running iterations in which all iterations after the iteration that calls the method need not run, the property is used to terminate iterations that began execution before the call to the method. 若要停止其索引大于从竞争执行的最低中断迭代的迭代，应执行以下操作：To stop iterations whose index is greater than the lowest break iteration from competing execution, you should do the following: 1. 检查是否属性是`true`。Check whether the property is `true`. 2. 退出迭代中，如果其索引大于属性值。Exit from the iteration if its index is greater than the property value. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 100 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 这可以防止其索引大于的迭代属性值从调用的后面启动方法，但它不会影响已开始执行的任何迭代。This prevents iterations whose index is greater than the property value from starting after the call to the method, but it does not affect any iterations that have already begun executing. 若要防止这些完成，每个迭代调用方法来检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。To prevent these from completing, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 因此，迭代检查的值如果属性，如果它大于当前迭代索引值，将立即返回。If so, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 请注意，因为值的值超出在并行循环的作用域，必须将其分配给一个变量，如果你想要保留其值是位于循环外可见。Note that, because the value is out of scope outside of the parallel loop, you must assign it to a variable that is visible outside of the loop if you want to preserve its value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ShouldExitCurrentIteration As Boolean
public: property bool ShouldExitCurrentIteration { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取循环的当前迭代是否应基于此迭代或其他迭代发出的请求退出。

span.span: Gets whether the current iteration of the loop should exit based on requests made by this or other iterations.

value.span: 如果当前迭代应退出，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current iteration should exit; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`true`任何以下条件下：The property is set to `true` under any of the following conditions: - 迭代的循环调用或。An iteration of the loop calls or . - 循环的迭代引发异常。An iteration of the loop throws an exception. - 循环都会被取消。The loop is canceled. 当此属性是`true`、类将主动尝试来禁止其他的循环迭代开始执行。When this property is `true`, the class will proactively attempt to prohibit additional iterations of the loop from starting execution. 但是，可能无法阻止其他迭代启动的情况。However, there may be cases where it is unable to prevent additional iterations from starting. 这也可能是长时间运行迭代已经开始执行这种情况。It may also be the case that a long-running iteration has already begun execution. 在这种情况下，迭代可能显式检查如果属性返回的属性和终止执行`true`。In such cases, iterations may explicitly check the property and cease execution if the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 100 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 这可以防止其索引大于的迭代属性值从调用的后面启动方法，但它不会影响已开始执行的任何迭代。This prevents iterations whose index is greater than the property value from starting after the call to the method, but it does not affect any iterations that have already begun executing. 若要防止这些完成，每个迭代调用方法来检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。To prevent these from completing, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 因此，迭代检查的值如果属性，如果它大于当前迭代索引值，将立即返回。If so, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 告知 循环应在系统方便的时候尽早停止执行。

span.span: Communicates that the loop should cease execution at the system's earliest convenience.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法指示不需要运行尚未启动的任何迭代循环。Calling the method indicates that any iterations of the loop that have not yet started need not be run. 它有效地取消循环的任何其他迭代。It effectively cancels any additional iterations of the loop. 但是，它不会停止任何迭代已开始执行。However, it does not stop any iterations that have already begun execution. 调用方法使属性以返回`true`仍在执行循环的任何迭代。Calling the method causes the property to return `true` for any iteration of the loop that is still executing. 这很适合用于长时间运行迭代，可以检查属性并退出尽早如果其值为`true`。This is particularly useful for long-running iterations, which can check the property and exit early if its value is `true`. 通常在其中一个结果后找到，则任何其他迭代需要执行的搜索算法，使用。 is typically employed in search-based algorithms, where once a result is found, no other iterations need be executed. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 10,000 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 10,000 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例输出所示，在调用之后执行任何迭代方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations execute after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/stop1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/stop1.vb#1)] 因为的循环迭代仍可能会执行时方法被调用时，每个迭代调用方法来检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果它返回`true`，迭代立即返回。If it returns `true`, the iteration returns immediately.

span.span: The method was called previously.

exception.span: 和 不能被相同循环的迭代组合使用。

span.span: and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.
